QUERY.TITLE: Cross-country_Skiing at the Olympic Games .
QUERY.DESC: Who won a cross-country_skiing event at the Olympic Games in 1994 ?
QUERY.NARR: Documents must mention the name and the nationality of at least one winner of the cross-country_skiing events at the Olympic Games in 1994 . Documents that indicate only the name of a winning team without giving the names of the individual skiers will not be considered relevant .
